<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Haagenti (The Whispers Within)](/Deities.aspx?ID=260)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 297</row>

Haagenti plays at seeming reasonable, tempting forbearance with his numerous helpful inventions. Yet, he's just as monstrous as any other demon, only giving his knowledge to those who'll use it to cause horrendous suffering. He claims to have invented the art of fleshwarping, and the many victims of his followers stand as a stunning testament to his true cruelty.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** practice alchemical transmutations, pursue knowledge whatever the cost, use your inventions to exploit others

**Anathema** aid Yasamoth, allow morality to interfere with research, destroy knowledge

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

**Favored Weapon** [Battle Axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=40), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=39), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=36)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Construct](/Spells.aspx?ID=318)

- **2nd**
[Humanoid Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=153)

- **4th**
[Bestial Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=670)

</column>
